metadata.name: BBRC CONTINENTAL COIN
metadata.description: Minted with gold, the BBRC Continental Coin is the physical representation of trust, honor and respect. They represent social contracts that assure the exchange of goods and services. A promise deeply rooted in a strict secret code, these coins are your proof of belonging and having them grants you universal access to the BBRC Universe. Use them wisely, or hold onto them as future utilities unfold. Visit BBRC.io for more information
